songs.title: Nothing Feels Like You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jesy]
I could have all the money
All the fancy treasures in the world
25 acres
Just to hold my diamonds and my pearls

[Pre-Chorus: Jade]
But all of that's a fantasy, nothing like I want to be
Baby you and me that's real, yeah
Something like a masterpiece
Would be up on galleries, you and I, that's real

[Chorus: Jade & Leigh]
If I had everything, it wouldn't mean a thing
Cause nothing feels like, nothing feels like you
No matter what they say can't take my love away
Cause nothing feels like, nothing feels like you
Baby even when we're miles apart
You'll always stay inside my heart
Let me tell you no one else will do
Because baby nothing feels like you

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne]
Boys will be boys
I've got plenty knocking at my door
But none of them compare
Baby, you're the one I'm waiting for, oh yeah

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie]
Cause I'm living in a fantasy every time you're here with me
Kiss me if it's real, yeah
Baby, you and me for keeps, you bring out the best in me
Now you know it's real, hey

[Chorus: Jade & Leigh]
If I had everything, it wouldn't mean a thing
Cause nothing feels like, nothing feels like you
No matter what they say can't take my love away
Cause nothing feels like, nothing feels like you
Baby even when we're miles apart
You'll always stay inside my heart
Let me tell you no one else will do
Because baby nothing feels like you

[Bridge: All & (Leigh-Anne) & {Perrie}]
No nothing like ya
No nothing like
No nothing like ya
No nothing like

[Chorus: Leigh-Anne & Perrie with All]
Baby, even when we're miles apart (when we're miles apart)
You'll always stay inside my heart (stay inside my heart)
Let me tell you no one else will do (no one else will do)
Because baby nothing feels like you

[Chorus: Jade & Leigh]
Even if we're miles apart
I'm well aware of it from the start
Nothing feels like, nothing feels like you
And no matter what they say
I hope you know that you're the one
I told you nothing feels like
Nothing feels like you

[Outro: All]
No nothing like you
No nothing like you
No nothing like
